CCEP Manager’s documentation

CCEP Manager is a standalone implementation of the F-Tract analysis pipeline allowing the processing of iEEG data coupled with electrical stimulation for the extraction of Cortico-Cortical Evoked Potentials (CCEP) features and the generation of connectivity atlases.

CCEP Manager documentation covers all aspects of the software, including its dependencies and requirements, a description of its interface, the details of the various processing steps and the tools available to explore and further analyze the data.

The quick start chapter could be a serviceable introduction to the general purpose and usage of the software.

CCEP Manager is also available on the Human Intracerebral EEG Platform (HIP).
